adviseScripts.text: Fishing is a big hobby of mine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Are you good at fishing, Captain?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'm a master angler.
Catching people is my specialty.
Really? I'm pretty good myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Waddya say we go fishing together sometime?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: We could end up catching a real whopper!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: ... Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: With a fishing rod?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: How is that even possible? Wouldn't a person be too heavy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: And what kind of bait do you use?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I discuss the ins and outs of fishing.
Anchor stares at the marine life in the box.
Marine life have faces only a mother could love, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: That's part of their charm.
They sure do.
Well said!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Apparently once you get hooked on something ugly, there's no going back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I can personally attest to how accurate that is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: They're positively repugnant, but I can't get enough of these little guys.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I doubt they'd appreciate hearing that, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: We better apologize to them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I talk more about marine life.
All these radar waves have been giving me a headache lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: What should I do when my head hurts?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'll take you to go see Mary.
Touch Anchor's forehead.
I despise going to the hospital,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: but if you're going with me, I'll... nah, I still won't go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I've got nothing but bad memories about the hospital.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Your hand is so cold. I think my headache isn't as intense anymore.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Can you leave your hand on my forehead for a while?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Anchor about headaches.
I wonder...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: If I hadn't become a Nikke, what would I be doing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: You'd be a starfish.
You'd be a member of the navy rescue team.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: What do you mean?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: How on earth could I become a starfish?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: We're two totally different species.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Navy rescue team?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: That would be fantastic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'm all about rescuing people,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: and I like being in the water, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I share our hopes and dreams with each other.
Helm said she's gonna buy me a swimsuit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: What kind of swimsuit should I choose?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Something cute with frills.
A one-piece with starfish designs.

Frills...?
Cute...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: It's hardly something I would have chosen, but if you think it'll suit me, I'll consider it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: We all know how much I like starfish,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: but that may look a bit strange.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Anchor about swimsuits.
What else can I throw in people's faces?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Starfish are getting a bit stale for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Jellyfish?
Octopus?
Jellyfish can be poisonous, so that'd be dangerous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: People could get stung if I'm not careful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: That's not a bad idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: It'd certainly stick to people's faces easily.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'll give it a try and throw one at Mast next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I have an enjoyable session with Anchor.
Captain,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: is there anyone else here aside from us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, there's someone... right beside you!
No, why?
Nice try.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Actually...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: there are several people surrounding you, Captain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Huh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: My radar is picking up other bodies. Must be malfunctioning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: You okay, Captain? You look awfully pale.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Anchor telling ghost stories.
I'm too lazy to clean today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Helm will probably give me an earful if I ask the marine life to take over for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: How could they help you clean?
I can help you.
It was a joke.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Actually, although it'd take them a bit longer, I'm sure they could do it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: There's a reason people say that marine creatures are practically the janitors of the ocean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I honestly wasn't saying that to try and get you to help me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: but since you're offering, who am I to refuse?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I clean with Anchor for a while.
The bird Mast always brings around is named Morgan, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I want to give the marine life names, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Got any good suggestions?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Sea Cucumbo, Spoony Worm, and Starry?
Let's put our brains together and think.
... Well, we finally discovered something you're terrible at, Captain. Thinking of names.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Sorry? I didn't catch that.

Nothing.
Any other suggestions? Let's think together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Sure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I don't want ordinary names.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I want names that really mean something, like...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I think up names for her sea creatures.
I have to prepare food for the boat party.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: What should I prepare?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Can't go wrong with seafood.
Nutrium would be a good choice for a party.
I don't think that will do, since Helm doesn't like seafood.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: After all, a party is where everyone has fun and enjoys food.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: That might be the right call.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: There could be some people who don't like seafood,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: but virtually no one will dislike Nutrium.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I plan out the menu for the upcoming boat party.
Sometimes when I look at the Admire, I can't help but feel it's lonely.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I can do to make it not as lonely?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Raise marine life on it.
It looks happy to me, because the Aegis squad is around.
That'd definitely give it some company.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: And it'd be like the sea was by its side.
You're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: But if Helm finds out, I'll never hear the end of it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to see how long I can raise them before she shows up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: That makes sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: But I don't think we alone can fill that void.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it's because it's not able to sail the high seas...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Anchor about the Admire.
You know the white uniforms Helm and Mast wear?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Do you think that kind of outfit would suit me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Your current outfit suits you perfectly.
I am a tad curious how you'd look in uniform.
I'm glad to hear that,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: but sometimes I want to wear something a bit more charismatic, like Helm or Mast.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: So you're curious too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: The next time I see Helm, I'll see if I can try on a uniform.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'm also curious myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Anchor about uniforms.
I heard there used to be an aquarium on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Why doesn't the Ark have one?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Should we build one in the Outpost?
We should hurry and reclaim the surface.
Here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Even if we do, it'd probably only be full of water and no actual fish.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: And when we do, we'll open our own sprawling aquarium!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Just thinking about it gets me pumped.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'd go there every day, and you could come with me, Captain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I continue to imagine our future aquarium.
Why can't marine life speak?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I get kinda jealous whenever I see Morgan talking to Mast.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Mimic marine life speaking.
You're connected to them on a spiritual level. They don't have to speak.
Anchor takes out a starfish from her pocket.
Sorry.
... Anchor puts the starfish back in her pocket.
Hey, you're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: We can understand each other even without talking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: How could I forget something so important?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I have a pleasant session together.
Mast has been making me watch pirate movies every day this week.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I think I've got nearly every line memorized by now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'll keep the pirate-related movies somewhere out of reach.
Just tell her you want to watch something else.
You would do that for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I will never forget the kindness you've done me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: If I do that,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Mast will only badger me about pirate novels or something else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Then she'll start going on about the history of pirates or other trivia. I'd rather watch the movie in peace.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I discuss how to deal with Mast.
... Captain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'm so sleepy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: We can end our session early today.
You can take a nap on my bed if you want.
*Yawn* Thanks. So sleepy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'm barely even registering what I'm saying right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Would that be okay?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Thanks. I spent all day yesterday watching seaweed,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: and barely got any sleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I lend Anchor my bed so she can catch up on some sleep.
Captain,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: how long can you stay underwater?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Probably longer than you can.
32 seconds on the dot.
Are you sure? I can hold my breath for around 10 minutes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Let's have a contest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Loser gets a starfish to the face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate the fact that you're always honest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I'll teach you how to stay underwater longer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time diving with Anchor.
Helm seems to have something on her mind, but she won't tell me what it is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Wait for her to open up.
Threaten her with a starfish.
You're probably right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Helm is the type to open up only after she's sorted everything out in her head.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Although plastering her with a starfish would definitely force her to fess up,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: my curiosity isn't strong enough to warrant such extreme methods.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I talk about Helm.
Captain,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I've got a question for you, and you need to guess the answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Are seahorses good or bad at swimming?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: They're good at it.
They're bad at it.
Nope.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Seahorses can't swim very well at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: How did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Seahorses are far from adept swimmers.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I only found that out recently.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Anchor and I continue to quiz each other on random trivia.
I feel so happy whenever Mast and Helm are near me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: but I don't know how to express that and tell them how I feel.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Imagine them as sea creatures.
I don't think you have to tell them. I'm sure they already know.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: That may be a bit of a mental leap. They don't exactly look like marine life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Any other suggestions?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: But how would they know if I've never told them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: You can always tell if you're special to someone by looking into their eyes.
Really? That's great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: Honestly, Helm and Mast are right up there with sea creatures for me. You too, Captain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anchor

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Anchor talk about Helm and Mast.
